description: The file defines interfaces for system management, discovery, configuration, lifetime management, and metadata within the WPEFramework's plugin controller namespace. It contains multiple abstract classes with pure virtual functions that specify the contract for plugin control and interaction.

classes.name: ISystemManagement
classes.description: Interface for system management operations such as reboot, delete, clone, and environment retrieval.

classes.name: IDiscovery
classes.description: Interface for network discovery control, starting discovery and retrieving results.

classes.name: IConfiguration
classes.description: Interface for managing configuration persistence and retrieval for plugins.

classes.name: ILifeTime
classes.description: Interface for managing plugin lifecycle events, activation, deactivation, suspension, etc., with nested INotification for state change notifications.

classes.name: IMetadata
classes.description: Interface providing metadata about proxies, plugin statuses, connections, process info, and version details.

methods.name: Reboot
methods.description: Reboot the device.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Remove the contents of a directory from persistent storage.

methods.name: Clone
methods.description: Create a clone of a plugin with a new callsign.

methods.name: Environment
methods.description: Retrieve the value of a specified environment variable.

methods.name: StartDiscovery
methods.description: Start network discovery with a specified TTL value.

methods.name: DiscoveryResults
methods.description: Retrieve SSDP network discovery results.

methods.name: Persist
methods.description: Store the configuration to persistent memory.

methods.name: Configuration
methods.description: Retrieve or set configuration data for a plugin.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Register a sink for lifetime notifications.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Unregister a sink from lifetime notifications.

methods.name: Activate
methods.description: Activate a plugin by its callsign.

methods.name: Deactivate
methods.description: Deactivate a plugin by its callsign.

methods.name: Unavailable
methods.description: Set a plugin as unavailable for interaction.

methods.name: Hibernate
methods.description: Set a plugin to Hibernate state with a timeout.

methods.name: Suspend
methods.description: Suspend a plugin.

methods.name: Resume
methods.description: Resume a suspended plugin.

methods.name: Proxies
methods.description: Get details of current proxies.

methods.name: Status
methods.description: Get the status of a plugin, including configurations.

methods.name: Links
methods.description: Get active connection details.

methods.name: ProcessInfo
methods.description: Get framework process information.

methods.name: Subsystems
methods.description: Get details of active subsystems.

methods.name: Version
methods.description: Get version hash and human-readable version info.

methods.name: CallStack
methods.description: Get call stack information for a given thread index.

ctags.name: IConfiguration
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IConfiguration : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: IDiscovery
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IDiscovery : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: ILifeTime
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL ILifeTime : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: IMetadata
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IMetadata : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^        struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: ISystemManagement
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL ISystemManagement : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
